articles.title: Slovak prosecutor drops racism charges against former PM Fico
articles.description: A Slovak special prosecutor has dropped racism-related charges against former prime minister Robert Fico, leader of the ruling Smer party, TASR news agency reported on Monday, meaning the case goes back to investigators.
articles.content:
PRAGUE (Reuters) - A Slovak special prosecutor has dropped racism-related charges against former prime minister Robert Fico, leader of the ruling Smer party, TASR news agency reported on Monday, meaning the case goes back to investigators.

articles.title: U.S. makes it harder to sue corporations over franchise wage law violations
articles.description: The Trump administration has made it harder for employees of fast-food restaurants or other big franchises to sue corporations when individual franchise owners violate wage laws, a step that was a top priority for business groups.

articles.title: U.S. issues fresh Venezuela-related sanctions: U.S. Treasury
articles.description: The United States on Monday imposed sanctions on seven Venezuelans, the U.S. Treasury Department said, in Washington's latest action to ramp up pressure on the government of President Nicolas Maduro.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The United States on Monday imposed sanctions on seven Venezuelans, the U.S. Treasury Department said, in Washington’s latest action to ramp up pressure on the government of President Nicolas Maduro.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: The sea turtles swimming again thanks to prosthetics
articles.description: Goody the turtle lost her left flipper years ago in Thailand - but now she's swimming properly again, thanks to a specially-designed prosthetic flipper. Lauren Anthony reports.
articles.content:
Posted 
Goody the turtle lost her left flipper years ago in Thailand - but now she's swimming properly again, thanks to a specially-designed prosthetic flipper. Lauren Anthony reports.
